ARABIC: قُلْنَا يَٰنَارُ كُونِى بَرْدًا وَسَلَٰمًا عَلَىٰٓ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We said, 'Fire, be coolness and peace for Ibrahim!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Turn cold, O fire," We said, "and give safety to Abraham."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We said: "O fire, become coolness and safety for Abraham."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We said to the fire, "Be cool and peaceful (with Abraham)".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We said, “O fire, become cool and peaceful upon Ibrahim.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: We said: "O fire! Be you cool and safety for Ibrahim!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: We said: O fire! be a comfort and peace to Ibrahim;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We said, 'O fire, be coolness and safety for Abraham!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: We said: O fire, be coolness and peace for Abraham,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But We said, "Fire! Be cool and a means of safety for Abraham."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: We said: O fire! be thou cool and peace unto Ibrahim
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We said, ‘O fire! Be cool and safe for Abraham!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We said, "O Fire! be thou cool, and (a means of) safety for Abraham!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: We (Allah) said: "O fire! Be you coolness and safety for Ibrahim (Abraham)!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: O Fire' We said, 'be coolness and safety for Abraham'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We said, “O fire, be coolness and safety upon Abraham.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Allah said, "O fire, be coolness and safety upon Abraham."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:69] We said, ‘O fire! Be coolness and safety for Abraham!’, and so it only consumed the bonds [with which he had been tied]. Its heat departed, but its luminosity remained. And by His words wa-salāman, ‘and safety’, Abraham was safe from (salima) death because of its coolness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (We said: fire, be coolness) against your heat (and peace) and safety from your coolness (for Abraham) for if Allah did not say "peace" the coolness of the Fire would have harmed him.
